chunk:
Plant Therapy Oil Facial Cleanser, Normal/Dry Skin

Brand: Plant Therapy

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Peel Oil, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E)
book: 2186-Plant Therapy Oil Facial Cleanser, Normal Dry Skin

chunk:
Directions: Massage 4-6 drops onto dry skin, avoiding eye area. Wet hands and continue to massage gently. Rinse thoroughly with warm water and pat dry. Follow with a water-based cleanser if desired.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 2186-Plant Therapy Oil Facial Cleanser, Normal Dry Skin
